message.body: Ya know, I can take a hint except when we actually do talk you don't seem to convey any annoyance or frustration with me. If the lack of response was from anyone else i would have stopped calling a long time ago. Cutting me out like this just seems out character for you, and for friendship i thought we shared. So I guess I'm a little confused. Not sure if I should just forget about u and bill completely at this point. I kinda thought you guys needed me in some way, or at least wanted me around. But I'm not trying to fight if I'm not wanted.
I hope you don't take that as mean or manipulative.
I just didn't realize that if we werent sleeping together, if I wasn't so close, I didn't realize we wouldn't talk as much. I guess it's my misunderstanding.

Please don't be offended, i don't think your an ass or mean or anything. And i still love you guys. Always will. I'm just trying to understand. You really were one of my best friends for so long. I really didn't want to loose that ya know?
Maybe we can't be friends maybe we can't be phone friends. Maybe there is some way you can help me manage my expectations. Hopefully.
Lots of bombs that haven't gone off yet
We love you too stay calm be mindful of your surroundings
